attributes.agent_name: Grand Central Motors Jeep Fiat Alfa Romeo Midrand
attributes.description: Finance Can Be Arranged. Excludes administration, delivery, and License Registration Fees. 80 Point Quality Check. Very Neat. Tradeins Accepted. Test drives welcome. Nationwide Delivery. Finance Is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please Come and visit our preowned manager and our business manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylormade deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our bistro. Tradeins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our finance and insurance manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information, or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Grand Central Motors Jeep, Fiat Alfa Romeo

attributes.description:
Welcome to the King of Cars Group

King of Cars has more than 15 years of experience in the motor industry and offers over 200 professionally evaluated vehicles. We offer advice & assistance to clients, from financial solutions to the smart way to buy / sell your vehicle. 

We also offer a ‘Breaking Borders’ approach. We can start the application process online or telephonically, complete the entire sale this way and even deliver the vehicle to your doorstep anywhere in South Africa. We’ll help you make the car of your dreams a reality.  

Contact or visit our showroom today!

Please Note: Administration, delivery and license and registration fees are not included.

attributes.description:
This Audi Q7 is one of those cars that will bowl you over immediately. The key ingredients to its powerful seduction abilities are refinement and cabin design. It's a one owner car, that's accident free and has a full service history with Audi. It has the following additional optional features and extras: Audi virtual cock pit, Adaptive air suspension, Electric foldable towbar, Full paint finish, Privacy glass, Side airbags, Front armrest, High beam assist, Rear view camera, 3rd row seats, 85lt fuel tank, Exterior lighting package, and more...
Call now to make this amazing Audi yours!!
Finance Available and 
Trade ins Welcome
